channel.title: terrible model clipping
channel.description:
Hello, i just downloaded and loaded up Black Messa for the first time. I had it on the lowest settings possible for best performance, and noticed severe model clipping all over the place in the initial train ride.
I tried upping the settings gradually, until i was at near max settings. My computer was still running it mostly fine, with little lag, but the clipping was still all over the place.
What can i do to fix this?
Thanks in advance
